description: '''Aram Avetiki Sargsyan''' ({{langx|hy|Արամ Ավետիքի Սարգսյան}}; born 5 April 1984), known professionally as '''Aram Mp3''' ({{langx|hy|Արամ Mp3}}; often stylized as '''Aram MP3'''), is an Armenian singer and comedian. He represented Armenia in the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2014]] with the song "[[Not Alone (Aram Mp3 song)|Not Alone]]", which finished in fourth place.
